column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I must say up front that I'm not a great lover of art
column2: but I do like the message that try to convey and the detail of the paintings.  Like most things in Chicago
column3: the admission price will knock you off of our feet
column4: almost forty bucks for two people.  I thought at that price you got to take a painting home.  The thing that really got to me is the security guards
column5: turn around there is a guard - turn a corner another guard.  Out of all the guards that we encountered
